name: Tosculi Jeweled Drone
description: A small humanoid with a striking appearance, the Tosculi Jeweled Drone is adorned with a glittering carapace, exuding an aura of danger and charm.
memorable: Its ability to enhance allies with pheromones and possibly blind foes with its scintillating carapace makes it a unique opponent.
goals: To support its allies in battle while hindering enemies through tactical maneuvers and environmental effects.
relations: Often found in the company of other tosculi, particularly hive queens.
environment: Typically inhabits dark or underground areas where it can leverage its tactical abilities.
strengths: High mobility and the ability to support allies significantly in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to strategic opponents who can avoid detection and its sight-based abilities.
attacks: Utilizes claws for slashing damage and possesses a scimitar that deals additional poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The scintillating carapace can blind non-tosculi creatures nearby, disrupting their actions.
senses: Has darkvision and passive perception of 12, aiding its tactical awareness.
skills: Proficient in Deception and Persuasion, making it skilled in diplomatic and manipulative situations.
additional_information: Immunity to being charmed or frightened.
Can enhance other tosculi's combat effectiveness with its pheromones.
Protects hive queens by boosting their armor class.
Capable of making multiple attacks in a single turn.
Can cause paralysis with its poison damage.
test_queries: deadly flying humanoid with poison attack
support creature that enhances allies in battle
monster that paralyzes foes with poison
